title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps deployed
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it should return an HTTP error 404 instead of an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL.
4. Verify that it returns an HTTP error 404.
